item.source: Half–Life 2 doesn't run bad on slow computers!

item.title: Half–Life 2 doesn't run bad on slow computers!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
that’s what I just said, I have one myself and with the lapdock hack it can play most if not all 720p videos in flash player on youtube, which a 1st get netbook like the Acer Aspire One cannot.

still, it can’t play any source games for now because there is no working ARM port in the wild, not even for GoldSrc.

Valve, If you bring me Half Life on Android I just may forgive you for the incident… you know which one. involving a certain Half Life 2 Episode…

Read full topic

item.description:
